title: 103_hr4704
content: The "Hopewell Township Investment Act of 1994" is also known as the Short Title. It involves the conveyance of land. The Administrator of General Services is authorized to transfer land in Hopewell Township, Pennsylvania to a nonprofit organization for economic development. The conveyance must occur within 180 days of the enactment of the Act. The conveyance of property in Hopewell Township, Pennsylvania to a nonprofit organization for economic development is subject to terms and conditions determined by the Administrator to safeguard the interests of the United States. The property will be conveyed by quitclaim deed and is described by specific boundaries in the township. Pennsylvania Legislative Route No. 60 (Beaver Valley Expressway) follows specific courses and distances, including points and lot divisions, before reaching a cul-de-sac on Industrial Drive. The Beaver Valley Expressway follows specific courses and distances, including curves, angles, and arc distances, before reaching a cul-de-sac on Industrial Drive. The Beaver Valley Expressway follows specific courses and distances, including curves, angles, and arc distances, before reaching a cul-de-sac on Industrial Drive. The route includes various directional changes and curve radii, with specific measurements for each segment. The Beaver Valley Expressway follows specific courses and distances, including curves and angles, before reaching a cul-de-sac on Industrial Drive. The route includes various directional changes and curve radii, with specific measurements for each segment, such as a curve to the right with a radius of 50.00 feet for an arc distance of 44.18 feet to a point on the northerly side of Airport Road. The Beaver Valley Expressway follows specific courses and distances, including curves and angles, before reaching a cul-de-sac on Industrial Drive. Thence by the same, South 75 degrees, 01 minutes, 00 seconds West, 1,351.23 feet to a point at the place of beginning. SEC. 3. ALTERNATIVE CONVEYANCE. If conveyance under section 2(a) is not completed within 180 days, Administrator can dispose of land to Hopewell Township, Pennsylvania.
